title: Reasons One For All + URF can NEVeR Happen
body:
{{champion:26}} Can'tK illTheZIL, also cannot escape the ZiL, cannot catch the ZiL, and cannot at any point not have a time bomb on you
{{champion:63}}http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/f/fa/Sear.png/revision/latest?cb=20130929122708&format=webp
{{champion:12}} mess with the bull and you get to leave the earth's orbit
{{champion:223}} A rumbling avalanche of fat that teleports across the map constantly and messily grinds anything in it's path to dust
{{champion:45}} NoExplanationNecessary
{{champion:96}} This is honestly the worst one, don't let anyone tell you otherwise.
Kog'maw One For All is a plague upon the game mode,
Kog'maw Urf is extremely frustrating to play against
Combine the two, and entire teams will AFK

replies.body: {{champion:31}}  Gonna get knocked up more than the whole series 16 and pregnant
That match would make somebody pay child support.

{{champion:90}} 
who even  NEEDS minion waves?

"Guys they're pushing mid."

"We have 3 super minions per wave, that'll hold them back."

"**That isn't stopping them.**"

> [{quoted}](name=ChaosThief,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=TJYNfuyR,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-11-08T16:06:23.290+0000)
>
> "Guys they're pushing mid."
> 
> "We have 3 super minions per wave, that'll hold them back."
> 
> "**That isn't stopping them.**"

{{item:3060}}
Jokes on you, Malz's voidlings deal attack damage.

> [{quoted}](name=SpecterVonBaren,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=TJYNfuyR,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-08T17:48:06.140+0000)
>
> Jokes on you, Malz's voidlings deal attack damage.

I've played AD malz\* and knew someone would point this out. 

######\*WHICH JUST GOT SO MUCH BETTER WITH NEW REAVER. FULL AD WITH NO MANA ISSUES AND 40% CDR
except ~~minions~~ voidlings do not benefit from crit...
Malz does though, plus CDR + mana on his crits, which is all he needs.

AD malz doesnt usually get in close enough to auto attack, he instead leaves his voidlings to do that. But who knows, things can change. The biggest challenge will always be making sure your voidlings stay on target.
That, and the fact that often times turret will auto target them ;-;

But he doesn't build crit or attack speed because voidlings cannot crit and have a set attack speed. He needs cdr, mana, armor pen/shred, and ad. Manamune is cheaper and gives him mana sustain after 750 gold. ER takes 3500 gold to give him mana sustain occassionally with increased frequency based on stats he won't build.
Neither does Ez, but everyone keeps saying he's getting the most buffs out of the marksmen.

Yes and no. A properly played adc ezreal will auto attack plenty and benefit from that crit. What is really helping him is the new options for CDR in marksman builds. Essence reaver with tri force gets you to 40% cdr without having to build lucidity boots which opens a ton of options for him.

while he may not auto nearly as much as other Marksman with how skill heavy his playstyle happens to be. He will still get in more than enough attacks inbetween those skills.
And the game would be over before anyone could finish banner
could already win games before 14 mins in urf...cant even imagine what 5 of them would be doing (no one would be getting any IP though...since games would end too fast lol
But what happens when two of those teams face each other...  Can a potential permastun (Brand) beat an AOE one (zil / veig)?  Can Kog take Veig? These questions need answers.

> [{quoted}](name=Rundus1,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=TJYNfuyR,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-08T07:19:55.449+0000)
>
> But what happens when two of those teams face each other...

the world explodes

{{champion:78}} Good luck trying to figure out who can hit whom. 
{{champion:44}} Permastun. Always permastun. 
{{champion:67}} {{champion:12}} {{champion:126}} Let's play soccer!
That poppy ...damn i would love to play them in that mode ! ahaha my god ! :P and btw she can play soccer too ;)

{{champion:34}} 
I PRESENT: THE ICE BOX
{{champion:30}} YOU SHALL NOT PASS !

{{champion:17}} Unleash the demons from hell.
also {{champion:99}} {{champion:161}}

> [{quoted}](name=Crett,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=TJYNfuyR,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-11-08T07:02:27.303+0000)
>
> {{champion:96}} This is honestly the worst one, don't let anyone tell you otherwise.
> Kog'maw One For All is a plague upon the game mode,
> Kog'maw Urf is extremely frustrating to play against
> Combine the two, and entire teams will AFK

Someone hasn't played Sona.

I know she was gutted in the rework, but one for all Sona is still an unstoppable wrecking ball and URF Sona is still an infinitely sustaining god of hatred. URF Sona is literally all about pressing QWE over and over constantly until someone dies, and it's probably not going to be the one always at full health.

Combine the two and you'll be hard pressed to get any damage onto them or ever be anywhere near _**THE MOB**_.
The Silent Quintet.
{{champion:268}} {{champion:105}} this will give me nightmares
I can confirm, Fizz OFA is pretty hilarious to watch. I don't know how good it is because our opponents were the anti-assassins {{champion:203}}
I played an OFA game as fizz, which was actually my first time ever as fizz. I carried the game {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
As cancerous as these team comps may be, they do sound like fun to play as.

Let's be honest, that's not the real reason. 


The real reason is because you have to do One for all+Urf+HEXAKILL first
Wait... don't you see friend? This is why it has GOT to happen! Please Riot! <3
But what about Doom Bots VS URF?

Nonono, you want "Ultra Rapid Hexakill Doom Ascension of the Poro King Mirror mode: Twisted Treeline"

Riot I accept 30RP Installments for use of my Ideas that are just stealing your Ideas and Slapping them all together.

Don't forget the cannon barrages.

I would be the AP gankplank, so you would probably hate me the most :3

On every one for all game, if we weren't a tank, I would build tank.

Just look at this: http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1988050592/209877961?tab=overview and see which Yasuo doesn't belong

I still managed to 1v1 one of them before the game ended, and even I don't have any fucking clue how that happened
